content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
with a as (SELECT
  result.filename() file_name,result.filepath() file_path,  *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/**',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
HEADER_ROW=true
    ) AS [result])
    select distinct file_name from a
